cast.name: 爱丽丝·罗伯茨 Alice Roberts

introduction: Back for a tenth season, this primetime archaeology series examines the rich history of the UK like never before.Every year, hundreds of archaeological digs from across the British Isles find clues that add to the great historical jigsaw of Britain’s story and our ancestors’ lives.  In this series, archaeologists up and down the country have been given diary cameras to record their extraordinary discoveries as they happen, and Professor Alice Roberts joins them on some of their most spectacular digs.Professor Alice Roberts and her team of experts venture back to the Viking Age, unearth Roman treasures and make extraordinary real-time discoveries in this show which uncovers over 10,000 years of British history.[Episodes]Roman Towns and Tudor ShipwrecksArthur's Stone and Georgian MineHeadless Romans and Anglo Saxon GoldMystery Shipwreck and Roman Army CampRoman Mosaics and Ancient WeaponsIce Age Camp and a Case of Syphilis[Credits]Presenter: Alice RobertsProducer: Denis MinihanLine Producer:	Claire RiddellSeries Producer: Theo WilliamsProduction Manager: Verity QuinnProduction Manager: Jordan SmithExecutive Producer: Rory WheelerProduction Company: Rare TV
